// Any_Publishing

t_Any_Publishing {
  Rule {
//--------------------------------------------------------------------
//--------------------------------------------------------------------
//--------------------------------------------------------------------

// Test case
// "The" "(quick)" ('brown') `fox' ` jumped --     "over?"

// Variables

"$single = \\\' ;"
"$space = ' ' ;"
"$double = \\\" ;"
"$back = \\\` ;"
"$tab = '\u0008' ;"
"$makeRight = [[:Z:][:Ps:][:Pi:]$] ;"

// fix UNIX quotes

"$back $back > “ ;"
"$back > ‘ ;"

// fix typewriter quotes, by context

"$makeRight {$double} <> “ ;"
"$double <> ” ;"

"$makeRight {$single} <> ‘ ;"
"$single <> ’;"

// fix multiple spaces and hyphens

"$space {$space} > ;"
"'--' <> — ;"
  }
}
